long_description:
### Note:
* Your HPbar will display as full, it's normally, because it calculates difference between current HP and max HP. This mod sets max HP to `1`, so `1`HP is now 100% of the bar.
name: ohko
short_description: Very simple mod for hardcore survival with 1HP
title: One hit knock-out
